snippet.title: Waifu App: 90 Days to Escape a Lonely Fate - Official Trailer
snippet.description:
Hiyori lives a very quiet and lonely life, but she decides enough is enough… She wants to change! And everything indeed changes when a spirit visits her and installs a strange app on her phone! The clock’s ticking now… There are 90 days left!

Waifu App: 90 Days to Escape a Lonely Fate on Kagura Games Store: https://www.kaguragames.com/product/waifu-app-90-days-to-escape-a-lonely-fate/

Waifu App: 90 Days to Escape a Lonely Fate on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/3329420/Waifu_App_90_Days_to_Escape_a_Lonely_Fate/
